snippet: After August, Texas’ curriculum support system, known as Cscope, will no longer be a source of lesson plans for the 875 school districts that rely on it.
lead_paragraph: After August, Texas’ curriculum support system, known as Cscope, will no longer be a source of lesson plans for the 875 school districts that rely on it.

headline.seo: End of Cscope’s Lesson Plans Will Leave Texas Schools in a Bind
headline.main: Policy Ending Criticized Lesson Plans Leaves Schools in a Bind
headline.print_headline: Policy Ending Criticized Lesson Plans Leaves Schools in a Bind
